name: Siebel eScript: Prefer using GotoView in the Finally clause of a Function
description: This rule reports Functions using GotoView outside the Finally clause
output: This rule reports Functions using GotoView outside the Finally clause
rationale:
The GotoView deactivates any business object, business component, applet, or control that is active.
Therefore this a cleaning method and as such find its best location in the Finally block.
remediation:
Add a Try-Catch-Finally structure if none exists.
Change the location of the GotoView statement for the finally block.
total: Number of added or modified eScripts
alternativeName: Siebel eScript: Prefer using GotoView in the Finally clause of a Function

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
